summary: Follows a woman's fight and survival amid the vicissitudes of life and the cruelty of society.
cast: Kinuyo Tanaka|Tsukie Matsuura|Ichirô Sugai|Toshirô Mifune|Toshiaki Konoe|Kiyoko Tsuji|Hisako Yamane|Jûkichi Uno|Eitarô Shindô|Akira Ôizumi|Kyôko Kusajima|Masao Shimizu|Daisuke Katô|Toranosuke Ogawa|Hiroshi Oizumi|Haruyo Ichikawa|Hiroshi Mizuno|Yuriko Hamada|Noriko Sengoku|Sadako Sawamura|Masao Mishima|Eijirô Yanagi|Chieko Higashiyama|Takashi Shimura|Benkei Shiganoya
title: La vida de Oharu, mujer galante
